Question: Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Specialized manufacturer of Tablet PCs and PC peripherals such as mice, keyboards, USB Hubs, and Web Cameras
- Located in Xiamen City, Haicang District, covering an area of 50,000 square meters with advanced manufacturing facilities
- Products comply with CE, FCC, UL, TUV & ROHS standards
- Advanced quality control system following the ISO9000:2008 standard
- Long-term partnerships with well-known companies and international supermarkets
- Factory with two production buildings and five electronic products assembly lines
- Established Medical Instrument B.U. in response to the epidemic situation, investing in mask and infrared thermometers production facilities
- Around 100 employees in the mask workshop
- ISO 13485 medical instrument quality system and CE certificates
- Address: No. 29-2 XinLe Road, Xinyang Street, Haicang District, Xiamen
